title: StackSkills Unlimited features lifetime access to more than 1,000 courses for under $20
content:
Macworld

Giving the gift of knowledge is priceless. And if that gift can also jumpstart a job search or even unlock a new career, its value is even more spectacular. Now, you can give someone special a lifetime of StackSkills Unlimited, a repository of critical tech and self-development training courses.

Scrolling through the more than 1,000 courses in the StackSkills archive proves its worth. With coursework in IT, personal development, graphic design, finance, business, marketing, and more, members enjoy lifelong access to a wealth of knowledge.

New courses are added monthly, and learners can dive into hot-button tech areas like web development, cyber security, cloud computing, and more. Beyond computers and programming, inquiring minds can also study topics like how to take better photos, succeed in business, deal with stress or avoid burnout, and much more.

Backed by a prestigious 4.6-out-of-5-star rating on TrustPilot, Engadget called StackSkills Unlimited a savvy fast track to “help you get promoted, change careers or start a side hustle.”

Score pre-Black Friday savings on lifetime access to StackSkills Unlimited, now just $19.97 until December 3 at 11:59 p.m. Pacific. No coupon necessary!

 

StackSkills Unlimited: Lifetime Access – $19.97
